channel.title: Start items
channel.description: Can any1 tell me how to chnage the items when start with which you are weilding like eg. d claws rune pl8 etc..

item.title: Start items
item.dc:creator: @wwe_justin wwe justin
item.description:
@wwe_justin wrote:

Thank you for your help guys really thankyou

Especially owner nader =D

Read full topic

item.title: Start items
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“PolarScape, post:7, topic:304602”][quote author=Owner Nader link=topic=400870.msg2971953#msg2971953 date=1254013979]

[quote author=PolarScape link=topic=400870.msg2971949#msg2971949 date=1254013903]

Open Player.java and search

playerEquipment[playerWeapon] =

You’ll see something like

playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = 4587; playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = 6585; playerEquipment[playerHands] = 7458; playerEquipment[playerFeet] = 3105; playerEquipment[playerCape] = 1052; playerEquipment[playerChest] = 3869; playerEquipment[playerLegs] = 2497; playerEquipment[playerHat] = 656; playerEquipment[playerShield] = 3842;

Change the numbers to the item id you want to start with.
[/quote]You’re too late bro

Mines Better Bro.
[/quote]mine is best bro.

You beat me by under 20 seconds bro.[/quote]

This one is better because it says correct file name.

Read full topic

item.title: Start items
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

k , first step .

  1. Go client.java and search for this // Giving the player an unique look

  2. And you should see something like that // Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=itemid; playerEquipment[playerCape]=itemid; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=itemid; playerEquipment[playerChest]=itemid; playerEquipment[playerShield]=itemid; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=itemid; playerEquipment[playerHands]=itemid; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=itemid; playerEquipment[playerRing]=itemid; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=itemid; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=itemid;

  3. Change the itemid to whatever you want,

Read full topic
